text: This is a list of airports in Laos (the Lao People's Democratic Republic), sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport name written in bold indicates availability of commercial flights. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline style="font-weight:bold; background:#EEEEEE;" | Location || ICAO || IATA || Airport name |- valign=top | Attopeu || VLAP || AOU || Attapeu International Airport |- valign=top | Ban Hat Tai || VLHS || OUI/HOE || Ban Huoeisay Airport (Ban Houei Sai/Ban Houay Xay) |- valign=top | Khong Island || VLKG || KOG || Khong Island Airport |- valign=top | Luang Namtha || VLLN || LXG || Luang Namtha Airport |- valign=top | Luang Prabang || VLLB || LPQ || Luang Prabang International Airport |- valign=top | Muang Xay || VLOS || ODY || Oudomsay Airport |- valign=top | Pakse || VLPS || PKZ || Pakse International Airport |- valign=top | Phonsavan || VLXK || XKH || Xieng Khouang Airport |- valign=top | Saravane || VLSV || VNA || Saravane Airport |- valign=top | Sam Neua || VLSN || NEU || Nathong Airport |- valign=top | Savannakhet || VLSK || ZVK || Savannakhet Airport |- valign=top | Sayaboury || VLSB || ZBY || Sayaboury Airport |- valign=top | Thakhek || VLTK || THK || Thakhek Airport |- valign=top | Vientiane || VLVT || VTE || Wattay International Airport |- valign=top | Phongsaly || || PCQ || Phongsaly Boun Neua Airport |} == See also == * Transport in Laos * List of airports by ICAO code: V#VL - Laos * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Asia#Lao People's Democratic Republic == References == * * == External links == *Lists of airports in Laos: **Great Circle Mapper **FallingRain.com **Aircraft Charter World **The Airport Guide **World Aero Data Laos Airports Airports Laos
title: List of airports in Laos
